Title: TweetStream
Description: A silverlight application that is 100% client side that uses the twitter streaming API
HomeWiki:
A truely Client Side ONLY Silverlight Twitter app, no using proxies on a server.

This will use new features in Silverlight 4

- Elevated Out of Browser app
- New Network layer authentication
- HTML object
- Camera / Microphone
- etc (many other new features)


- running SL4 beta app can be found here : http://www.cynergysystems.com/blogs/blogs/jose.fajardo/TweetStream/TweetStream.html

NOTE : I AM CURRENTLY REVVING THIS FOR VS2010 RC
